description: a (book):  grey cover; color photographs--primarily abstractions; poetry-like text with some nonsence words and numbers; b (print):  loose print in back of book:  \"P 001\"; abstract image of geometric rectilinear shape--red with pink designs--on lightly creased white paper with two blue spots (paper fragments?); separate label with print with artists\' signatures in black; numbered 11/150
marks: Signature on colophon page (last page), in black ink: [M Mot
title: Location, Volume 2
